alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 12:11AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Dale and central Coffee Counties through 1245 AM CDT... At 1210 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elba, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Level Plains, New Brockton, Lee, Mixons Crossroads, Carl Folsom A/p, Gerald, Turner Crossroads, Camp Humming Hills, Clintonville, Wise Mill, Goodman, Camp Alaflo Bsa, Basin, Enterprise Municipal A/P, Woodland Grove Church and Richburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
